block.mishanguc.tooltip.road: Speed up when walking on the road.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_straig: Straight line is in the axis of player's looking.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_angle_: Angle's inner is towards the player's looking.
The side of angle nearest to player's looking
is located at the center; the other side is offset.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_auto_l: Converted to proper road block on block update.
You can manually trigger by clicking its top.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_joint_: The side line points to player's looking direction.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_offset: The line is offset to the left, or the right when sneaking.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_joint_: Straight line is in the axis nearest to player looking.
Smaller corner of the straight line and side line
will be in the direction nearest to player's looking.
block.mishanguc.hung_sign.tooltip.1: Can be written texts on both sides.
block.mishanguc.hung_sign.tooltip.2: Usually placed below ceiling or sign bars.
block.mishanguc.wall_sign.tooltip.1: Click to write texts on it.
block.mishanguc.wall_sign.tooltip.2: Can be placed on wall, ceiling or floor.
block.mishanguc.standing_sign.tooltip.1: Can be written texts on both sides.
block.mishanguc.standing_sign.tooltip.2: Click when sneaking to toggle the display of post.

block.mishanguc.colored_block.tooltip.au: Color is dependent on block near where placed.
item.mishanguc.road_connection_state_deb: Click on the road to get line information
item.mishanguc.id_checker_tool.tooltip.1: Get its id data when clicking block.
item.mishanguc.fast_building_tool.toolti: Can quickly place or destroy multiple blocks on a plane.
Hold Shift or Alt and scroll mouse wheel to switch matching mode.
item.mishanguc.force_placing_tool.toolti: Force to place a block without triggering block update.
Also used to break a block without triggering block update.
Can be used to place and remove fluids.
item.mishanguc.data_tag_tool.tooltip: Can get the NBT data of blocks and entities.
item.mishanguc.block_state_tool.tooltip: Click the block to get the block state.
Can get the fluid state while sneaking.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.su: Successfully copied %1$s rows of text of the block.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.fa: Cannot paste texts as the NBT of the item is wrong!
Cannot paste texts as no text is yet copied. Please hold this item and click %s to copy texts.
Unexpected error was thrown when pasting text.
Ths block you clicked is not supported. Supported blocks include vanilla sign blocks, hung sign blocks and wall sign blocks.
The %s side of this block can not have texts. Valid sides are %s and %s.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.wa: Some rows are skipped as a vanilla sign only accepts 4 lines.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.su: Successfully pasted %1$s rows of text on the block.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.wa: Some colors are ignored, as a sign only supports one color.
Some colors are ignored, as a sign only supports limited number of colors.
item.mishanguc.omnipotent_tool.tooltip.1: Can instantly break blocks and kill entities by clicking %s,
item.mishanguc.explosion_tool.tooltip.3: Hold Shift or Alt and scroll mouse wheel to adjust power.
item.mishanguc.explosion_tool.tooltip.4: No item drops while in Creative Mode.
item.mishanguc.explosion_tool.tooltip.5: The explosion does not damage you even in Survival.
item.mishanguc.emotion_tool.1: Click %s on an entity to irritate it,
item.mishanguc.emotion_tool.2: or undo the tame of a tamable entity,
item.mishanguc.emotion_tool.3: or let the villager add extra price.
item.mishanguc.emotion_tool.4: Click %s on the entity to stop the irritation,
item.mishanguc.emotion_tool.6: or let the villager reduce price.
item.mishanguc.color_tool.tooltip.1: %s to copy color from a block,
item.mishanguc.color_tool.tooltip.2: %s to apply the color to a block that supports custom colors.
item.mishanguc.color_tool.message.no_dat: You should copy a color from any block first.
item.mishanguc.color_tool.message.not_co: Cannot set the color of the block. Only some specific blocks in this mod can have custom colors.
item.mishanguc.color_tool.message.succes: Successfully set the block color to %s.
Successfully copied the color %s from the block.
item.mishanguc.road_tool.tooltip.1: %s to remove lines of the road.
item.mishanguc.road_tool.tooltip.2: %s to place automatic lines on the road.
item.mishanguc.road_tool.message.cleared: Cleared the line paintings on the road.
item.mishanguc.road_tool.message.painted: Added automatic lines on the road.
item.mishanguc.road_tool.message.convert: Converted automatic lines on the road.
item.mishanguc.road_tool.message.not_roa: The block you clicked is not a road block.
item.mishanguc.growth_tool.tooltip.1: Using this item and crops, animals and monsters
item.mishanguc.growth_tool.tooltip.2: nearby will be grown up quickly.
item.mishanguc.growth_tool.tooltip.3: When sneaking, the effect will be opposite.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.tooltip.1: Pick and place any block, including fluid.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.tooltip.2: All block states and block entity data will be reserved.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.message.blo: Successfully thrown %s. As you are in Creative Mode, you can continue throwing the same block.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.message.pla: Successfully placed %s. As you are in Creative Mode, you can continue placing the same block.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.message.no_: Cannot place block because the item does not carry any block.
Cannot place block because the item does not carry any block.
Cannot pick block or item because the item is carrying %s.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.message.spa: Successfully summoned %s. As you are in Creative Mode, you can continue spawning the same entity.
item.mishanguc.carrying_tool.message.ent: Successfully thrown %s. As you are in Creative Mode, you can continue throwing the same entity.
debug.mishanguc.notRoad: This is not a road block
debug.mishanguc.roadConnectionState: The connection state of road at %s at %s side:
debug.mishanguc.roadConnectionState.allD: The connection state of road at %s:
debug.mishanguc.id.name: §7Name: §r%s
debug.mishanguc.blockStates.none: The %s located at %1$s has no properties.
debug.mishanguc.dataTag.block.null: The %2$s located at %1$s has no data tags
debug.mishanguc.dataTag.block.header: The %2$s located at %1$s has the following data tags:
debug.mishanguc.dataTag.entity.entity: The %2$s located at %1$s has the following data tags:
debug.mishanguc.nbt.compound_display_ful: Click to display the full tag
debug.mishanguc.nbt.list_display_full: Click to display the full list
notice.mishanguc.version_check: Please note: The development of Mishang Urban Construction for Minecraft %s has been discontinued. Please consider using %s. Operators can type command %s to suppress this notice for this level.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mishanguc: An amount of blocks and items that make a beautiful city! Currently not stable. Please do not use in your formal work!
gamerule.mishanguc:warn_deprecated_versi: Warn Deprecated MC Version for Mod
Send a message if you are using the Minecraft version that may be not supported of Mishang Urban Construction mod.
gamerule.mishanguc:force_placing_tool_ac: Determine which type of players are allowed to use force placing tool.
Determine which type of players are allowed to use carrying tool.
gamerule.mishanguc:explosion_tool_access: Determine which type of players are allowed to use explosion tool.
message.tool_access: You cannot use this item because %s can use it.
message.mishanguc.add_text.description: Add a line of text after the current selected text. The position of other texts will not be affected unless you click 'rearrange'.
message.mishanguc.remove_text.descriptio: Remove the current line of text.
You cannot edit this sign as %s is editing it now.
message.mishanguc.shade.description: May cause rendering error. Not recommended to turn on.
message.mishanguc.moveUp.description: Move the current text field up. Does not affect their displaying unless you rearrange after moving.
message.mishanguc.moveDown.description: Move the current text field down. Does not affect their displaying unless you rearrange after moving.
message.mishanguc.rearrange.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal offsets of contents. Text lines in absolute mode will be ignored.
message.mishanguc.clear.description: Clear all texts. Cannot be undone!
message.mishanguc.clear.confirm.descript: Click again to clear all text. Cannot be undone!
message.mishanguc.add_first_text: Click here to add first text!
message.mishanguc.absolute.description: In absolute mode, rearranging texts will ignore this line.
message.mishanguc.absolute.composed: Absolute: %s (if on, rearranging texts will ignore this line)
message.mishanguc.flip.description: Flip the offset and alignment of the current text in the left-right direction. Hold 'Ctrl' to flip all texts.
message.mishanguc.apply_double_line_temp: Quickly add two lines arranged with one large and one smaller. This is often used in bilingual notices.
message.mishanguc.apply_left_arrow_templ: Quickly add two lines and a left-arrow. This is often used in bilingual direction instructions.
message.mishanguc.apply_right_arrow_temp: Quickly add two lines and a right-arrow. This is often used in bilingual direction instructions.
